synopsis: Kemal and Cebbar, who dream of going to Istanbul, sell their shops in Adana. Kemal comes to Istanbul to get the shop money. Here she meets A Decel and there is a rapprochement between them. Meanwhile, he finds out that Cebbar has to come to get the money. Arriving in Istanbul the next day, Cebbar admits that the money is not for the shop, but because he is an informant. Kemal, who understands that they are in trouble, will try to get out of this situation while taking care of Aysel on the one hand.
casting: ['Tanju Gürsu', 'Çolpan İlhan', 'Leyla Sayar', 'Mualla Fırat', 'Öztürk Serengil', 'Çolpan İlhan', 'Mualla Kavur', 'Ahmet Tarık Tekçe', 'Ali Şen', 'Senih Orkan', 'Nubar Terziyan', 'Osman Alyanak', 'Atıf Avcı', 'Vehdi Ersin', 'Osman Türkoğlu', 'Atilla Yelkenci', 'Nusret Özkaya']

synopsis: Collection of images lost and memories found.
tagline: Memories always find their way back to us.
